title: Cold Iron Is a Titanic Comedy

sources.title: Cold Iron Is A Titanic Comedy
sources.description: COLD IRON IS A TITANIC COMEDY (The Neoist Beach Edit...) "A tin-foil road-trip to Florida & the British Museum, in faster isolating language that dialogues over the electric kettle of Toronto's City Hall and rotates in perpetual stillness towards a tsunami of row-boat performances. This film has very little to do with the sinking of the Titanic and much more to do with visual beauty, absurdist prose & abstract denial". The first feature length art-film by the absurdist performance poet, noise musician, and no-budget art house director Wesley Rickert. Starring Istvan Kantor, aka, Monty Cantsin, (as the Neoist Pied Piper) Art Rai Szombathy, (as Louis IV) Ian Malone, (as Juan Ponce De Leon) Christina Kozak, (as Tally Aurora) Henry Benvenuti, (as Captain Smith) Kathleen Reichelt, (as the Ventriloquist) The Hercinia Art Collective, (as the Sirens) Sandra Fitzsimmons, (as Liberty) Tonya Henry, (as the old flame) Olivia Roblin, (as Janus) Amber X, (as the Captains Hallucination) Eszter Jagica, (as the Fountain of Youth) Kirsten Webb, (as a Gorgon) Ashley Zarowny, (as Vincent Van Gogh). Score by the electronic noise band BURNING ICEBERG. GENRE No-budget / Avant-garde PRODUCTION 2K Sony xdcam, B&W and Colour, 74 minutes, 2014 Licensing available for public exhibition or broadcast This motion picture is Copyright Â© 2014, Wesley Rickert, Canada. A 253469 Production "an umbrella without the hat" http://www.253469.com/
